Description: Refers to the number of groups used. Equals records_sample_size if no grouping is used
Refers to the total number of records used

Refers to the arithmetic mean. For trades, the mean is the VWAP computed over the grouped trade records ∑ (price * quantity) / ∑ quantity For oracle prices, the mean is computed over the price records ∑ (price) / prices_count
Refers to the time-weighted average price which equals ∑ (price_i * ∆t_i) / ∑ ∆t_i where ∆t_i = t_i - t_{i-1}
The timestamp of the oldest record considered
The timestamp of the youngest record considered
Refers to the smallest individual raw price considered
Refers to the largest individual raw price considered
Refers to the median individual raw price considered
